message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $150. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you for $200. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this item at a special price. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of the product, $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for it. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To accommodate you, I am willing to consider $140 as the price for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows you to purchase this high-quality item.
